title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

items.content_html: @pastor_ey @momblogger @wawam of course in no way do I support spammers, but as a matter of common sense I like to take into account other POVs and understand why policies are in place. And note that they only disclose your number if there is a dispute. I have been reporting on average 3-5 spam messages per week for the past few months and have never received a dispute. Again, it seems like a perfectly reasonable policy to me. @arnelc24 @yusufledesma @talk2GLOBE
items.summary: @pastor_ey @momblogger @wawam of course in no way do I support spammers, but as a matter of common sense I like to take into account other POVs and understand why policies are in place. And note that they only disclose your number if there is a dispute. I have been reporting on average 3-5 spam messages per week for the past few months and have never received a dispute. Again, it seems like a perfectly reasonable policy to me.

items.content_html: @pastor_ey @momblogger sure they have sms logs; unless of course they purge the logs on a regular basis and someone falsely accuses you using a months-old alleged spam text. Or maybe an ex of yours uses one of your real texts to falsely accuse you of being a spammer just to spite you. IDK all the ways anonymous reporting can be abused, but like I said, if I was accused of being a spammer, I’d want to know who is accusing me and the details. There’s probably a reason why in criminal law, defendants are accorded the right to know the details of the accusation and to face their accuser @arnelc24 @wawam @yusufledesma @talk2GLOBE
items.summary: @pastor_ey @momblogger sure they have sms logs; unless of course they purge the logs on a regular basis and someone falsely accuses you using a months-old alleged spam text. Or maybe an ex of yours uses one of your real texts to falsely accuse you of being a spammer just to spite you. IDK all the ways anonymous reporting can be abused, but like I said, if I was accused of being a spammer, I’d want to know who is accusing me and the details.
